headline.main: AN ANTHROPOLOGIST LOOKS AT THE WAR; AN ANTHROPOLOGIST LOOKS AT WAR

lead_paragraph: CRO-MAGNON cave men crouched in rock shelters in prehistoric time. Now modern city dwellers crouch in caves of steel and concrete. The "progress" of civilization apparently has led merely from one cave to another. What is "civilization," and why, after centuries of growth, is it still so vulnerable?
abstract: Article quoting Dr B Malinowski on anthropologist's point of view
